statements: UPDATE users SET username = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE username = 'John Doe';
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = '12345';
UPDATE users SET username = 'johndoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '67890';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET price = 50.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE purchase_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET price=15.99, product_name='New Product' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_data SET birth_year = 1990, pseudo_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE analytics_data SET data_value = 25.5, analysis_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_data SET pseudo_name = 'John Doe', birth_year = 1990 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE activity_logs SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE orders SET quantity = 10, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE order_id = 102;
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE user_data SET username='john_doe', gender='M' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE purchase_data SET payment_method='Credit Card', purchase_amount=150.50 WHERE purchase_id=5;
UPDATE user_data SET email = 'newemail@example.com', gender = 'F' WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE product_data SET category = 'Electronics', price = 999.99 WHERE product_id = 5678;
